Uses of Package
net.sf.ntru.encrypt

  • Packages that use net.sf.ntru.encrypt 
    Package Description
    net.sf.ntru.encrypt
    Contains classes specific to NTRUEncrypt
    net.sf.ntru.polynomial
    Provides classes for performing polynomial arithmetic
  • Classes in net.sf.ntru.encrypt used by net.sf.ntru.encrypt 
    Class and Description
    EncryptionKeyPair
    Contains a public and a private encryption key
    EncryptionParameters
    A set of parameters for NtruEncrypt.
    EncryptionParameters.TernaryPolynomialType 
    EncryptionPrivateKey
    A NtruEncrypt private key is essentially a polynomial named f which takes different forms depending on whether product-form polynomials are used, and on fastP
    The inverse of f modulo p is precomputed on initialization.
    EncryptionPublicKey
    A NtruEncrypt public key is essentially a polynomial named h.
    PassphraseBasedPRNG
    Deterministic random number generator initialized from a passphrase.
  • Classes in net.sf.ntru.encrypt used by net.sf.ntru.polynomial 
    Class and Description
    IndexGenerator
    An implementation of the Index Generation Function IGF-2 in IEEE P1363.1 section 8.4.2.1.
